lead_paragraph: Louisiana State quarterback Ryan Perrilloux, who has had legal and disciplinary problems throughout his college career, was kicked off the team. Perrilloux was expected to take over the starting job after being the backup as a sophomore last year.
snippet: Louisiana State quarterback Ryan Perrilloux, who has had legal and disciplinary problems throughout his college career, was kicked off the team. Perrilloux was expected to take over the starting job after being the backup as a sophomore last year.
